Lyric:
[00:25.730]My face above the water
[00:30.920]My feet can't touch the ground,
[00:33.430]Touch the ground, and it feels like
[00:36.950]I can see the sands on the horizon
[00:40.380]Everytime you are not around
[00:44.870]I'm slowly drifting away (drifting away)
[00:50.370]Wave after wave, wave after wave
[00:55.840]I'm slowly drifting (drifting away)
[01:01.210]And it feels like I'm drowning
[01:04.390]Pulling against the stream
[01:07.060]Pulling against the stream
[01:31.610]I wish I could make it easy
[01:37.210]Easy to love me, love me
[01:41.880]But still I reach, to find a way
[01:44.590]I'm stuck here in between
[01:46.480]I'm looking for the right words to say
[01:50.760]I'm slowly drifting, drifting away
[01:56.280]Wave after wave, wave after wave
[02:01.760]I'm slowly drifting (drifting away)
[02:06.900]And it feels like I'm drowning
[02:10.190]Pulling against the stream
[02:12.940]Pulling against the stream
